body.p:
i have receevedreceived your letter to day all safe with the envelopes and all right i had Mr Burroughs and his friend to see me yesterday tuesday Tuesday they got in yesterday morning and was going to leave at 4 ocl o'clock in the afternoon they were here about an hour i think i should like burrouhsBurroughs very much and the man with him too was very friendly it dident didn't put me aback in the least things were in order and i happened to have on a clean cap they thought the house very good and your portrait attracted theer their special attention i asked them to stay and have dinner but they declined said they could not as they had to go somewhersomewhere i beleive believe & i was glad to hear you had been there last sunday Sunday and took breakfast) it has been very hot here and so much cloudy unwholsome unwholesome weather i have felt quite bad some part of the time worst i would feel would be in the morning when i first got up i would feel so exausted exhausted as if i never could doo do any thing but when i got some coffee i would feel better but these two or three mornings back i have felt better) georgeGeorge has not been home since i wrote last to you he dident didn't know but they would send for him to inspect here but i suppose they haveent haven't he says he has to work real hard out there so many pipe to handle but he feels pretty well has a good appetite he says he has the rheumatis in his legs and hip i dont don't think its the rheumatis at all i think its the affects of his fever when he was a prisoner in the war
well waltWalt i have had a letter from mattyMatty the other day they seem to be all getting along finely mattyMatty sent me two 25 cent bills quite a lift wasent wasn't it waltWalt well waltWalt i dont don't want to complain of any body but i doo do think sometimes they might send me a few dollars but to send 50 cents i thought it rather small when i think of what i have done for them i dont don't think i would be indebted if they was to send me considerable) Jeff sent a letter to George after he left for camden Camden wanted an immediate answer) now waltWalt i will tell you all about the affairs between georgeGeorge and jeffJeff i think you will understand it in the first place jeffJeff let georgeGeorge have 500 dollars georgeGeorge gave him a note forit and then he let him have 500 hund more he gave him a note for that that made 1000 dollars one was given last august August and the other last september September and when matt was on here georgeGeorge lent her 50 dollars she told jeffJeff to pay georgeGeorge but he dident didn't so georgeGeorge thought it could go to pay the interest of the notes or toward it) when jeffJeff was on i said to him couldent couldn't he let georgeGeorge have what money he would want to build with and take a mortgage on this house i thought it would be an advantage to jeffJeff as well as georgeGeorge so he asked georgeGeorge how much he would want and georgeGeorge told him three thousand dollars jeffJeff said he would let him know when he went back and georgeGeorge said when the other house was sold he would pay off the two notes and only have the three thousand stand well jeffJeff sent drafts at different times till he had sent it all but 600 dollars that was to make out the mortgage you see waltWalt and then he stopped dident didn't send any more finally the mortgage was made out and executed and left at the recorders office and six hundred wasent wasn't received so when georgeGeorge was home he said that six hundred he should keep to pay you and when the house was sold he should have some coming and would make up enoughf enough to pay off the notes to jeffJeff) well this letter to georgeGeorge was to see if georgeGeorge couldent couldn't pay the notes off as jeffyJeffy wanted to go into some speclulation speculation in an iron furnace manufactory but he said for georgeGeorge to not sell the house by any means so i wrote a letter to him that georgeGeorge was away
and would be home in 2 weeks and that he had transferedtransferred the 1000 dollar mortgage on the steers property to the mason that done the work) jeffJeff wrote to know if georgeGeorge held that mortgage yet so i dont don't know how it go) if you cant can't understand walterWalter dear you must read it over two or three times) when matt wrote to me she generally asks how waltWalt is and they would like to have you come on there well i dare say they would well i said in my letter to matt waltWalt seems quite well now and the same good old standby sends eddEdd and me our daily substance i thought afterwards maybe they would think it was a hint to them but i thought i dident didn't care good bie Walter it will bring it near september September if you dont don't come till two months well
come when you will we will be glad to see you and you will be welcome walterWalter dear
